name: The legacy of W. Whitlaw VR
name_original: The legacy of W. Whitlaw VR
description:
Short description:

"The legacy of W. Whitlaw VR" is a Single-Player Escape-Room-VR-Game. You wake up in a room with no clue where you are and why, 

so you have to solve puzzles to figure out the mysteries and get out. Maybe there is more to it then you might think?

GameFeatures:

  • Move freely through the room.
  • Adjust your navigation through the room as you like it.
  • Interact with almost anything around you.
  • Solve small and large puzzles by looking closely and combining objects.
  • Enjoy the atmosphere and choose your own background music.
  • And if you don't know what to do, just get a hint and solve the riddle!

Minimal system requirements:

  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Memory: 2.6 GHz Quad Core or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Video Card: GeForce GTX 1050Ti series or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Disk Space: 1,55 GB available space
  • Further information: 64-bit operating system is required

Recommended system requirements:

  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Prozessor: AMD ryzen 5 1600 or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Video Card: GeForce GTX 1070 series or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Disk Space: 1,55 GB available space
  • Further information: 64-bit operating system is required

Further information:

The  game was developed using Windows Mixed Reality glasses  (Samsung Odysey +).

The control was created and optimized for this system. If problems occur on other VR glasses, please report them by e-mail. We will then endeavor to remedy this promptly.
